TITLE: Microlearning
DEF: Small, focused units of content, designed for quick and efficient knowledge acquisition
TASK: The Microlearning pattern delivers small, targeted units of learning content. It caters to learners' busy lifestyles or specific learning needs by providing easily digestible information. To improve this pattern, break down content into significant and concise units, devise engaging activities, and provide avenues for application and reinforcement. AI can be used to assist in breaking down content and assessing understanding.
